user.about:
Love programming, good coffee and life. I support OSS, creativity and freedom.
[LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/pub/vinit-kumar/10/1a9/2b1) [Blog](http://vinitkumar.me) [Bitbucket](https://bitbucket.org/vinitkme) [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/users/859112)

badges.description: Have at least one original repo where C is the dominant language
badges.name: T-Rex

badges.description: Have a repo followed by a member of the GitHub team
badges.name: Octopussy

badges.description: Sent at least one pull request during the first 24 days of December 2013
badges.name: 24PullRequests Participant

badges.description: The walrus is no stranger to variety. Use at least 4 different languages throughout all your repos
badges.name: Walrus

badges.description: Truly improve developer quality of life by sharing at least 50 individual open source projects
badges.name: Philanthropist

badges.description: Have a project valued enough to be forked by someone else
badges.name: Forked

badges.description: Fork and commit to someone's open source project in need
badges.name: Charity

badges.description: Have at least three original repos where Python is the dominant language
badges.name: Python 3

badges.description: Would you expect anything less? Have at least one original repo where Python is the dominant language
badges.name: Python

badges.description: Have at least one original jQuery or Prototype open source repo
badges.name: Cub

badges.description: Have at least one original Node.js-specific repo
badges.name: Honey Badger

badges.description: Have at least one original repo where some form of shell script is the dominant language
badges.name: Raven

badges.description: Increase developer well-being by sharing at least 20 open source projects
badges.name: Altruist

user.name: Vinit Kumar
